articles.title: Vodafone to reintroduce roaming fees for UK customers in Europe - The Guardian
articles.description: Provider joins EE in bringing back charges for people to use their phone in mainland Europe from next year

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Soccer-FC Barcelona member files complaints to block any Messi move to PSG - The Star Online
articles.description: PARIS (Reuters) -     An FC Barcelona member has filed complaints with a French court and with the European Union Commission with the aim of blocking any move by Lionel Messi to Paris Saint Germain soccer club, according to documents seen by Reuters on Monday.

articles.author: Ryan Morrison
articles.title: European Space Agency's Solar Orbiter completes its second flyby of Venus - Daily Mail
articles.description: Solar Orbiter is on its way to study the polar regions of the sun in a bid to better understand its 11-year cycle and made its close approach at 05:42 BST, according to the European Space Agency.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency's Solar Orbiter spacecraft has made its second flyby of Venus, just 33 hours before the BepiColombo craft makes its close approach.
